og.site_name: Privacy Policy - Filecoin Foundation for the Decentralized Web

header.heading: Privacy Policy
header.description: Effective Date: December 13, 2021. Filecoin Foundation is committed to protecting the privacy and security of the information we collect and to being transparent about the ways in which we collect and process your information. This statement (the “Privacy Policy”) sets forth our policies and practices for handling the information we collect from or about you.
